articles.title: The Flash's Ezra Miller dances wildly at Hawaiian bar... weeks after arrest at another bar - Daily Mail
articles.description: The hot-tempered 29-year-old attempted to dance away their legal woes at Hilo Axe Lounge to tracks by T-Pain and Trey Songz
articles.content:
The Flash's Ezra Miller attempted to dance away their legal woes at Hilo Axe Lounge on Hawaii's Big Island on Friday night.
